question: A electrician works for 5 weeks every month and for 7 days every week. If he gets paid €110 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The electrician works for 7 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 7 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<7*5=35>>35 days/month
If he earns €110 every day he then earns €110/day * 35 days/month = €<<110*35=3850>>3850/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns €3850/month * 12 months/year = €<<3850*12=46,200>>46,200
#### 46,200
